Class PreferencesData

java.lang.Object
cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.config.PreferencesData
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PreferencesData extends Object implements Serializable
Data Transfer Object (DTO) that encapsulates all user preferences related to the CleanStream application.

This class acts as a plain data holder and represents the configurable settings defined in the Preferences panel.

It does not contain business logic. Its responsibility is only to store and transport configuration values between:

  • The Preferences UI panel
  • The persistence layer (e.g., Preferences API or properties)
  • The services layer (download, scanning, playback)

All fields have corresponding getters and setters following JavaBean conventions, allowing integration with UI frameworks and potential serialization mechanisms.

Author:
metku
